description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 23/02195/FUL: SuDS (6) in respect of public realm landscaping improvements at Palace Gardens Square, involving ground levelling, pavement resurfacing, step arrangements, removal of existing telephone boxes, brick planters, cone benches, lighting columns with erection of raised planters with seating, lighting columns and planting of trees.
